string.text: Send everything to home settlement stash
Sends your entire pre-battle inventory to your home settlement. Items that wouldn't be lost will also be transferred. If you don't own a settlement, your items will stay in your inventory instead.
Prevents the game from removing any items after defeat. You keep everything, regardless of what the game would normally take.
Sends only the items the game removes after defeat to your home settlement.
Removes all non-quest items from your inventory after defeat. Nothing is kept or transferred.
